document.full_text: a resounding victory over compatriot feliciano lopez proved a welcome tonic for rafa nadal at the rome masters thursday after the spaniard said he almost withdrew from the tournament with a fever.
document.title: ailing nadal still too hot for lopez in rome
lines_and_colors: a resounding victory over compatriot feliciano lopez proved a welcome tonic for rafa nadal at the rome masters thursday after the spaniard said he almost withdrew from the tournament with a fever.
